name: ~The Swarm~
description:
How to play:

Sound does not work for WebGL build, and it has lots of lag. Download for best experience. (Also, if you know how to fix the audio please comment).

WASD to move.

Space to jump.

Left Click to shoot.

Scroll or 1 and 2 to change weapons.

Escape key to pause.

Get pickups to increase health and weapon ammo.

Don't get hit by the aliens.

Some aliens come from spawners. Destroy these to stop them!

Unlock doors with keys and get to the portal to advance.

Weapons:

  • Pistol - Infinite ammo, semi-auto, single shot.
  • Shotgun - Limited ammo, full auto, burst fire, uses blue ammo.
  • Energy gun - Limited ammo, semi-auto, large area of effect, uses yellow ammo.

Modifications:

  • 3 modified levels.
  • Different victory Screen.
  • Shotgun art changed and settings changed.
  • Pistol art changed.
